global_param.name: CUSTOM_FONT_SIZE
global_param.label: Title Font Size
global_param.description: Font sized used for the title in the start up screen

global_param.name: CUSTOM_ICON
global_param.label: Custom Icon
global_param.description: URI to a custom image to be used as start up logo

global_param.name: CUSTOM_ICON_WIDTH
global_param.label: Icon Width
global_param.description: Width of the custom image (by default 35px)

global_param.name: CUSTOM_WELCOME_MESSAGE
global_param.label: Welcome Message
global_param.description: An additionnal message displayed in the start up screen

global_param.name: CLIENT_TIMEOUT_TIME
global_param.label: Client Timeout
global_param.description: The length of the client session in SECONDS. By default, it's copying the server session length. In most PHP installation, it will be 1440, ie 24minutes. You can set this value to 0, this will make the client session 'infinite' by pinging the server at regular occasions (thus keeping the PHP session alive). This is not a recommanded setting for evident security reasons.

global_param.name: CLIENT_TIMEOUT_WARN
global_param.label: Warning Before
global_param.description: Number of MINUTES before the session expiration for issuing an alert to the user

global_param.name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID
global_param.label: Analytics ID
global_param.description: Id of your GA account, something like UE-XXXX-YY

global_param.name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_DOMAIN
global_param.label: Analytics Domain
global_param.description: Set the domain for yuor analytics reports (not mandatory!)

global_param.name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_EVENT
global_param.label: Analytics Events
global_param.description: Use Events Logging, experimental only implemented on download action in AjaXplorer
